nodes.text: Mawvorr, also known as crysfangs, were a hostile, non-sentient species native to the planet Voss. The four-legged, multicolored creatures were primarily found in the Old Paths and the Nightmare Lands, where they were especially abundant in the Flamewood and Crysfang Glade areas respectively.
A dark-skinned variety of mawvorr known as bog mawvorrs were common in the Endless Swamp of Zakuul.
